actor_awards.notes: Won Golden Globe for Best Supporting Actor for 'The Rainmaker'

filmography.title: The Rainmaker
filmography.role_description: The naive and sweet-natured younger brother of a spinster who becomes entangled with a charismatic con man.
filmography.plot: A con man arrives in a drought-stricken Midwestern town, promising to bring rain for a fee, and changes the lives of a rancher's family.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Forbidden Planet
filmography.role_description: The starship's cook who humorously conspires with Robby the Robot to produce bourbon.
filmography.plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

filmography.title: Giant
filmography.role_description: The son-in-law of the Benedict family, marrying their daughter Judy in this sprawling generational epic.
filmography.plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

filmography.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
filmography.role_description: A deputy sheriff who supports Wyatt Earp and Doc Holliday in their conflict with the Clanton gang.
filmography.plot: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound, Best Film Editing (Film)

filmography.title: The Big Combo
filmography.role_description: A sadistic henchman and hitman working for a crime boss, partnered with Lee Van Cleef's character Fante.
filmography.plot: A police lieutenant is ordered to stop his investigation of a crime boss, but he continues his obsession with the case.

filmography.title: Last Train from Gun Hill
filmography.role_description: The spoiled, cowardly son of a wealthy cattle baron who commits a heinous crime, sparking a marshal's pursuit.
filmography.plot: A marshal tries to bring the son of an old friend, now a powerful cattle baron, to justice for the rape and murder of his wife.

filmography.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
filmography.role_description: One of the four Elder brothers who return home for their mother's funeral and investigate her death.
filmography.plot: Four brothers reunite in their Texas hometown to attend their mother's funeral and investigate the mysterious circumstances of her death.

filmography.title: Broken Lance
filmography.role_description: One of the sons of a domineering cattle rancher who rebels against his father's authority.
filmography.plot: A cattle baron's empire is threatened by his own sons as he tries to keep control of his land and family.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Motion Picture Story (Film)

filmography.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
filmography.role_description: A helicopter crewman who assists in rescue missions during the Korean War.
filmography.plot: A Navy fighter pilot must come to terms with his own ambivalence towards the war and the fear of having to bomb a set of highly defended bridges.

filmography.title: Police Woman
filmography.role_description: The commanding officer and supportive partner of undercover cop Pepper Anderson. (TV Series)
filmography.plot: A trio of police officers investigate various crimes in Los Angeles, with one of them frequently going undercover.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Angie Dickinson)

filmography.title: The Twilight Zone: Where Is Everybody?
filmography.role_description: An amnesiac man who finds himself wandering through a completely empty town in the series premiere.
filmography.plot: A man wakes up in a small town to find that he is the only person there, and begins to crack under the strain of isolation.
filmography.awards: Hugo Award: Win – Best Dramatic Presentation (Series)

filmography.title: Sharky's Machine
filmography.role_description: A corrupt politician involved with the criminal organization being investigated by Sharky.
filmography.plot: A vice cop is demoted to the basement but stumbles upon a major crime ring involving high-level corruption.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – New Star of the Year (Rachel Ward)

filmography.title: Tribes
filmography.role_description: A tough Marine drill instructor who clashes with a hippie draftee's nonconformist ways.
filmography.plot: A marine drill instructor is disgusted when he has a flower power hippie in his platoon.

filmography.title: I Died a Thousand Times
filmography.role_description: A young, inexperienced criminal who joins a veteran bank robber for a heist.
filmography.plot: An aging bank robber intends to pull off one last heist before retiring, but things go wrong.

filmography.title: Summer and Smoke
filmography.role_description: A traveling salesman who becomes a momentary distraction for the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A repressed spinster falls in love with a hedonistic young doctor in a small Mississippi town.

filmography.title: The Trap
filmography.role_description: The alcoholic brother of the sheriff who struggles with his own weakness and his wife's infidelity.
filmography.plot: A lawyer for a mob boss returns to his hometown to clear the way for the mobster's escape, clashing with his sheriff father and brother.

filmography.title: Visit to a Small Planet
filmography.role_description: The boyfriend of the daughter in the family that the alien Kreton stays with.
filmography.plot: An alien with a penchant for the American Civil War lands in the present day and causes chaos for a suburban family.

filmography.title: Don't Go Near the Water
filmography.role_description: An enlisted sailor in a PR unit who falls in love with a nurse, violating regulations against officer-enlisted fraternization.
filmography.plot: Navy public relations officers stationed on a Pacific island during WWII deal with boredom, romance, and an obnoxious war correspondent.

filmography.title: Trooper Hook
filmography.role_description: A young cowboy who joins a sergeant in escorting a white woman who was a captive of the Apaches.
filmography.plot: A cavalry sergeant escorts a white woman, released by Apaches, and her mixed-race son back to her husband, facing prejudice along the way.

filmography.title: The Biscuit Eater
filmography.role_description: A stern but loving father and dog trainer who doubts the potential of his son's dog.
filmography.plot: Two boys train a bird dog that others have deemed worthless to compete in a championship.

filmography.title: Hot Spell
filmography.role_description: The son in a dysfunctional family who struggles with his father's expectations.
filmography.plot: A housewife tries to keep her family together despite her husband's midlife crisis and desire to leave.

filmography.title: The Power
filmography.role_description: A scientist and colleague of the protagonist who becomes involved in the search for a man with psychic abilities.
filmography.plot: One of a team of scientists has a super-intellect and telekinetic powers, and is killing off the others to protect his identity.

filmography.title: Anzio
filmography.role_description: A tough sergeant in the Rangers involved in the Battle of Anzio.
filmography.plot: Allied forces land at Anzio, Italy, during WWII but are bogged down by cautious leadership and German resistance.

filmography.title: Gunsmoke: Return to Dodge
filmography.role_description: A former prisoner and old acquaintance of Matt Dillon who aids him in a new fight.
filmography.plot: Retired Marshal Matt Dillon is drawn back to Dodge City to face an old enemy released from prison.

filmography.title: Delta
filmography.role_description: The owner of the bar and grill where the aspiring country singer protagonist works.
filmography.plot: An aspiring country singer struggles to make it big in Nashville while working as a waitress.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor in a Series, Miniseries or TV Movie

filmography.title: The Desperate Mission
filmography.role_description: A scoundrel and gunfighter who befriends Joaquin Murrieta and joins him on a dangerous mission.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of Joaquin Murrieta who, after losing everything, becomes a mercenary hired to protect a wealthy landowner's wife.

filmography.title: Smoke
filmography.role_description: The new stepfather of a young boy who struggles to connect with him until they bond over a dog.
filmography.plot: A young boy nurses a lost German Shepherd back to health but hides him from his new stepfather, fearing he will be forced to give the dog up.

filmography.title: Alexander: The Other Side of Dawn
filmography.role_description: A social worker who tries to help young men involved in prostitution on the streets of Los Angeles.
filmography.plot: A young man from the country arrives in Hollywood and falls into a life of male prostitution while trying to survive.
